post.body: Definitely an addiction...but LOVE it!
Mwah back to you, Sandi! Glad to be following you too!
I will certainly try and make it sunny around me. I could look at my yellow lab named "Sunny". He's nearby!
I'm used to having the sun shine through my office window. It's really what inspires me to be productive every day. I miss that.
You're welcome! I have to thank @CherylHarless for mentioning your name as her VTP Trainer in January. U have a great student!
Glad to have another NC BBQ lover in the crowd! Makes me hungry now just thinking of it. :)
North Carolina BBQ is my fave. Definitely not sweet, but tangy with lots of vinegar in it. Yum! Yum!
I second that. Good job, Kyle! Be careful getting those meals out today. And keep that smile going that I see each time I open TW.
Was that audio and video time, Kyle?
Oh! Oh! Me...me...me!!!
Adel, I'm going to recommend to you Tell A Friend Pro, http://www.tafpro.com/. Fabulous script setup every time!
Sounds like a plan to me. I'll pull out my pen and pad and start brainstorming now.
It's when I'm at my best. Let's do it! I smell a JV coming on. :)
The positive thing about getting up and working super early is that it allows you the time you need with your kids. Love it
We're so much alike when it comes to our sleep times...or lack thereof. :)
My plans exactly, Donna! I need to go load up on my sugared coffee now so I can make to midnight!
I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
Anytime, Sandi. Nite, nite!
Wellll, I know I will miss you! :) Anyone else?
We shall see, Sandi! Go have fun and don't worry about us Twitterers. We'll manage.
Signing off now. Dinner and relaxation for this busy girl! G'night all!
Alex Mandossian's 5 Ways to RePurpose Articles on Facebook/Twitter. Good read! http://twurl.nl/bwh3fc
Yep, another foggy and cloudy day in NC. Where's the sun??? It might as well have snow on the ground if it's going to look like this!
Social Networking for Coaches and VA's NCC Telediscussion - January 20, 2009. Sign up here: http://twurl.nl/3bxbrg
Looking forward to a day of website edits for clients and I think I'll throw in some marketing for myself too. Yeah! Sounds like a plan.
Anytime, Linda. DM me if you have any specific questions you want to ask about working with Coaches. :) http://is.gd/cpih
RT @moniqueterrell: Hey, everyone join me in CoachesVA, a Tweetworks group. http://is.gd/cncI
Hi, all. Aletha here from @dcvirtualoffice. Just want to pop in &say thanks for the CoachesVA group. 98% of my practice ar http://is.gd/co3R
Hi, all my followers! Another cloudy day in NC. Haven't seen the sun in about 10 days and feeling a blue Christmas coming on.
RT @dawngoldberg: @StacyBrice Remember... the red lights ALWAYS turn green. :)
Cool! Those kind of chat are really fun. All the more reason to work VIRTUALLY from home!
Happy Friday morning! I've got my coffee in hand (hope you have, Sandi) and I'm ready to face the work at my desk today. Yay!
New Twitter Directory: Are You Listed? Find out here: http://twurl.nl/0q6gdr
Off to spend some time with my two children before the first day of the year comes to an end. It was nice not to work today!
Off to the store to grab an onion and cornbread mix to compliment today's traditional meal! Couldn't find an onion anywhere in my house!
Top Social Media Sites for 2008. Interesting! Check it out here: http://twurl.nl/8dr2wf
I'm thankful for a beautiful new day, a new year and the possibilities ahead for my business and personal life. Happy New Year Twitterverse!
To my Twitter followers, Happy New Year! Off to start enjoy'g the rest of the nite w/ family. Take care & I'll "see" u on the other side!
Definitely a good audience to target, Donna. Looking forward to it! <Aletha McManama>
Good morning to you all! What's your New Year's Eve plans for tonite? Going out or staying in to celebrate?
